caption.p: Number of publications (a) and funding (b) for antiviral research over time. Funding data were extracted from NIH RePORTER. The number of publications on antiviral drug research was obtained via PubMed. In both cases, the search was based on the co-occurrence of the keywords ‘antiviral’, ‘drug’, and ‘research’. The start date of each epidemic is depicted as a vertical dashed line. Abbreviations: COVID-19, coronavirus 2019; MERS, Middle East respiratory syndrome; NIH, National Institutes of Health; SARS, severe acute respiratory syndrome.
